Jibe SDK Version 2.3.3 - stable (build 103)

The Jibe App-to-App SDK provides developers with a simple, easy-to-use set of functions, which enable their applications to use realtime communication features, such as live audio, live video, low-latency data, chat and file sharing, with just a few lines of code.

See:
          Description

Simplified, high-level APIs
jibe.sdk.client.simple Parent package for high-level Jibe SDK API.
jibe.sdk.client.simple.arena High level API for accessing Arena, e.g.
jibe.sdk.client.simple.call High level API for peer-to-peer audio (VoIP)
jibe.sdk.client.simple.contacts High level API for checking the currently available communication capabilities of a remote user.
jibe.sdk.client.simple.filetransfer High level API for peer-to-peer file sharing
jibe.sdk.client.simple.myprofile High level API for checking the user's profile details and the current of the connection to the Jibe Cloud and the Jibe Network.
jibe.sdk.client.simple.session High level API for low-latency, peer-to-peer data connections over RTP/UDP
jibe.sdk.client.simple.videocall High level API for peer-to-peer audio (VoIP)
jibe.sdk.client.simple.videosharing High level API for peer-to-peer video sessions

 

Low-level APIs for communication features
jibe.sdk.client.call VoIP implementation for in-app audio (Full MMTel feature set in development)
jibe.sdk.client.chatsession RCSe chat sessions over MSRP
jibe.sdk.client.contacts Extended contact management including querying for a contact's RCSe capabilities
jibe.sdk.client.filetransfer RCSe file transfer over MSRP
jibe.sdk.client.group RCSe group chat related classes to used together with the ChatSessionService
jibe.sdk.client.videosharing RCSe video sharing

 

Low-level APIs for Jibe Core
jibe.sdk.client Parent package for all Jibe SDK classes
jibe.sdk.client.apptoapp Contains classes and packages related to Jibe App2App
jibe.sdk.client.arena Access to Arena specific functionality
jibe.sdk.client.authentication Authentication with the Jibe Cloud
jibe.sdk.client.communitymanager Tracks the registration state across all communities of the user (including mobile networks with IMS/RCS, social networks, chat networks)
jibe.sdk.client.events Event subscription model used by the Jibe SDK to notify a client application of changes in state see Connection lifecyle
jibe.sdk.client.myprofile Jibe Cloud user profile management and access to the RCSe profile defined for this user by the mobile operator

 

Utilities
jibe.sdk.client.utils Utility classes

 

Other Packages
jibe.sdk.client.history Convenience classes to manage a database containing the history of all peer to peer communication events (chat messages, etc.)
jibe.sdk.client.imagesharing  
jibe.sdk.client.video  
jibe.sdk.util  

 

The Jibe App-to-App SDK provides developers with a simple, easy-to-use set of functions, which enable their applications to use realtime communication features, such as live audio, live video, low-latency data, chat and file sharing, with just a few lines of code. Communication is established directly via the mobile network operator's IMS/RCS infrastructure, which delivers the fastest possible mobile-data transmission, via peer-to-peer communication.

The Jibe SDK has been designed to make the best use of the programming paradigms available on each target platform. This enables developers to quickly integrate realtime features without having to learn new techniques or protocols.
